nodes.text: Harwakokok the Mighty was a Wookiee male and a member of the Wookiee resistance on Kashyyyk. He was killed during a three-way battle aboard the Avatar Orbital Platform between the resistance, the Blackscale slavers, and a team of spacers sent by a rival Trandoshan slaver group to destroy the platform.

Harwakokok appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
